title: Learner Agency-Enhanced Multiliteracy-Based Integrated College Mathematics and English Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and understanding of elementary mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Applying blended language strategies considering multilingual contexts and limited tech access (smartphone-centric).

learning_goals: Learners can apply English-native language translanguaging strategies in over 80% of tasks for explaining mathematical concepts.
Learners autonomously design multimodal literacy-based assignments integrating digital/text/visual materials three or more times.
Learners accurately identify and correct peers' mathematical English expression errors in over 70% of cases through peer review.

resources: Digital Authoring Tools (Canva, Padlet Mobile Version)
Collaborative Worksheet Template with Integrated Auto-Translation
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
